Card.Name: Llanowar Elves
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {G}.

Card.Name: Glowspore Shaman
Card.RulesText: When Glowspore Shaman enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from your graveyard on top of your library.

Card.Name: Stitcher's Supplier
Card.RulesText: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.

Card.Name: Diregraf Ghoul
Card.RulesText: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: Plaguecrafter
Card.RulesText: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

Card.Name: Golgari Raiders
Card.RulesText: Haste Undergrowth — Golgari Raiders enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard.

Card.Name: Poison-tip Archer
Card.RulesText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Whenever another creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

Card.Name: Ravenous Chupacabra
Card.RulesText: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

Card.Name: Golgari Findbroker
Card.RulesText: When Golgari Findbroker enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Underrealm Lich
Card.RulesText: If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards of your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

Card.Name: Karn, Scion of Urza
Card.RulesText: +1: Reveal the top two cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your hand and exile the other with a silver counter on it. −1: Put a card you own with a silver counter on it from exile into your hand. −2: Create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."

Card.Name: Dead Weight
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

Card.Name: Walk the Plank
Card.RulesText: Destroy target non-Merfolk creature.

Card.Name: Murder
Card.RulesText: Destroy target creature.

Card.Name: Vraska's Contempt
Card.RulesText: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

Card.Name: Cast Down
Card.RulesText: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.

Card.Name: Crucible of Worlds
Card.RulesText: You may play lands from your graveyard.

Card.Name: Liliana, Untouched by Death
Card.RulesText: +1: Mill three cards. If at least one Zombie card is milled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. −2: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control. −3: You may cast Zombie spells from your graveyard this turn.

Card.Name: Vraska, Relic Seeker
Card.RulesText: +2: Create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with menace. −3: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") −10: Target player's life total becomes 1.

Card.Name: Memorial to Folly
Card.RulesText: Memorial to Folly enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Folly: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Overgrown Tomb
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: Woodland Cemetery
Card.RulesText: Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

Card.Name: Golgari Guildgate
Card.RulesText: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

Card.Name: Foul Orchard
Card.RulesText: Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.
